revisionDesc.change: Initial TEI transcription from PanGeo Partners, Inc.

body.p: The bazaar of the Deaconess Society at Wicker Park Hall was fairly well attended on Wednesday evening. Miss Dagmar Anderson presented a piano solo; Mrs. Rygh gave a soprano solo, and a quartet from the Covenant Church sang several numbers. All those appearing in the program received much applause.

The president of the society, Adolf Larsen, gave a survey of the work of the Society during the past years since the Deaconess Hospital was organized. He spoke encouragingly of the future, with special reference to the erection of the new hospital building. Several articles were sold by auction; coffee and cakes were served.
On Thursday evening Reverend [H. B.] Kildahl spoke. The articles left over from the previous evenings were disposed of by auction.
